data.title: 25 Bollywood Movie Riddles with Answers
data.meta_description: A Computer Science portal for geeks. It contains well written, well thought and well explained computer science and programming articles, quizzes and practice/competitive programming/company interview Questions.
data.text:
Welcome to the dazzling world of Bollywood, where stories come to life through vibrant colours, foot-tapping music, and unforgettable characters. This collection presents 25 riddles that will take you on a cinematic journey through the heart of Indian cinema. From timeless classics to contemporary blockbusters, these riddles are designed to test your knowledge of iconic Bollywood movies. Are you ready to unravel the magic behind these clues and guess the names of these beloved films?

Bollywood Movie Riddles:

1. A king with an iconic pose, a lover with a violin, and a villain with a memorable laugh. What Bollywood classic is this?

2. A love story where “King of the World” meets “My Heart Will Go On.” What movie is it?

3. A blind dubbing artist fights for justice when his wife faces injustice and dies. What movie is this?

4. Three friends, a bachelor trip, and a tiger. Can you name this hilarious adventure?

5. A teacher with a unique approach to education, starring Aamir Khan. What movie is it?

6. A magical romance between a barfi-eating man and an autistic woman. What’s the movie?

7. An alien with a sweet tooth and a heart of gold. What’s the Bollywood movie?

8. A tale of forbidden love, royal lineage, and destiny. What epic Bollywood film is this?

9. Two con artists on a mission. Can you name this entertaining duo?

10. A team of girls who dreams big, a coach who believes in them. What’s the name of this sports drama?

11. A story of three friends in the city that never sleeps. What’s the Bollywood movie?

12. A modern-day adaptation of a Shakespearean tragedy, starring Shahid Kapoor. What movie is it?

13. A superhero who defies gravity and dances his way into our hearts. What Bollywood film is this?

14. A timeless romance that spans generations and boundaries. What classic Bollywood movie is this?

15. A comical tale of a aging father and his daughter, set on an entertaining road-trip. What movie is it?

16. A school with a difference, where students learn life lessons beyond textbooks. What Bollywood movie is this?

17. A dance competition that brings together two rival groups. Can you name this Bollywood dance film?

18. A modern-day romance with a tragic twist, starring Ranbir Kapoor and Deepika Padukone. What’s the movie?

19. A tale of two brothers, one with a heart of gold and the other with a fiery temper. What Bollywood movie is this?

20. A quirky comedy about a dysfunctional Parsi family and their eccentric landlord. What’s the movie?

21. A sports drama that follows the journey of an underdog boxer from the streets of Mumbai. What’s the movie?

22. A cross-border love story that transcends political boundaries. What Bollywood film is this?

23. A man with short-term memory loss sets out on a quest to find his wife’s murderer. What’s the movie?

24. A coming-of-age film about a teenage girl pursuing her passion for wrestling. What’s the Bollywood movie?

25. A musical drama about a rock band’s journey to fame, with Ranbir Kapoor in the lead. What movie is it?

Answers

1. Mughal-e-Azam

2. Dilwale Dulhania Le Jayenge (DDLJ)

3. Kaabil

4. The Hangover (Bollywood adaptation: Zindagi Na Milegi Dobara)

5. Taare Zameen Par

6. Barfi!

7. Koi… Mil Gaya

8. Devdas

9. Bunty Aur Babli

10. Chak De! India

11. Dil Chahta Hai

12. Haider

13. Krrish

14. Dil To Pagal Hai

15. Piku

16. 3 Idiots

17. ABCD: Any Body Can Dance

18. Tamasha

19. Kabhi Khushi Kabhie Gham (K3G)

20. Khosla Ka Ghosla

21. Mary Kom

22. Gadar: Ek Prem Katha

23. Ghajini

24. Dangal

25. Rockstar
